Summary: The Desktop category has mobiles and audio devices
Creator: Ranjith C
Description:
Expected Result:
The User should be taken to the proper Categories page for selected category for all the categories and the products should be relevant

Actual Result:
The User is taken to the proper Categories page for selected category for all the categories and the Desktop category has mobiles and audio devices

Steps to reproduce:
1) Click on the categories dropdown button below the search bar and select the show all button

Summary: The Email ID field accepts space as first value
Creator: Ranjith C
Description:
Expected Result:
1) The Welcome page should be visible
2) The Register Page should be visible
3) An error message "E-Mail Address does not appear to be valid!" must be shown

Actual Result:
1) The Welcome page is visible
2) The Register Page is visible
3) The Email ID field accepts space as first value

Steps to reproduce:
1) Click on 'My Account' dropdown (ER-01)
2) Click on Register (ER-02)
3) Enter space as first value in Email ID Field
4) Enter valid password in Password Field
5) Click Login (ER-03)

Summary: The User is taken to login Page with a text showing "Your password has been successfully updated."
Creator: Ranjith C
Description:
Expected Result:
1) A mail with password reset link should be received in the entered Email address
2) Password reset message should be shown and Mail should be received with Password Change notification

Actual Result:
The User is taken to login Page with a text showing "Your password has been successfully updated."

Steps to reproduce:
1) Click on Login in 'My Account' dropdown
2) Click on Forgotten Password Link
3) Enter valid value in Email ID field in forgottern password page and click Continue (ER-01)
4) Open the Mail Id inbox and select the message received from opencart
5) Click on the password reset link from opencart
6) Enter valid and same values for Password and confirm password
7) Click continue (ER-02)

Summary: The Order is not returned
Creator: Ranjith C
Description:
Expected Result:
1) The User should be take to cancellation page
2) The Order should be returned
3) The Order status should be changed as cancelled for that order

Actual Result:
1) The User is taken to cancellation page
2) The Order is not returned

Steps to reproduce:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Order History in right column options
3) Click view button in any order
4) Click Return button (ER-01)
5) Fill the mandatory fields and Click Continue (ER-02)
6) Go to Order History (ER-03)

Summary: The Default address is not selected automatically in existing address field
Creator: Ranjith C
Description:
Expected Result:
1) New Address should be added to Address display page
2) The Default address should be selected automatically in existing address field

Actual Result:
1) New Address is added to Address display page
2) The Default address is not selected automatically in existing address field

Steps to reproduce:
1) Click My account header and click My Account
2) Click Address Book in right column options
3) Click New Address
4) Fill only mandatory fields
5) Select 'yes' in default address radio button
6) Click continue (ER-01)
7) Add some products to cart
8) Click checkout (ER-02)
